SELECT p.pid, p.title, p.img, p.description, p.content, COUNT(c.cid) AS commentNum, COUNT(l.lid) AS likeNum, COUNT(s.sid) AS shareNum, u.uid, u.username, u.avatar, p.create_time AS createTime FROM pet_post p LEFT JOIN pet_post_comment c ON p.pid = c.pid LEFT JOIN pet_post_like l ON p.pid = l.pid LEFT JOIN pet_post_share s ON p.pid = s.pid JOIN pet_user u ON p.uid = u.uid
p.deleted = 0
AND p.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
GROUP BY p.pid, u.uid

SELECT p.pid, p.title, p.img, p.description, p.content, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pet_post_comment c WHERE c.pid = p.pid ) AS commentNum, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pet_post_like l WHERE l.pid = p.pid ) AS likeNum, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pet_post_share s WHERE s.pid = p.pid ) AS shareNum, p.uid, u.username AS username, u.avatar AS avatar, p.create_time AS createTime FROM pet_post p INNER JOIN pet_user u ON p.uid = u.uid WHERE p.pid = #{pid};
